attributes.review: This app is horrible do not download as trump said to cnn saying it was “fake news” I’m saying this app is also in fact FAKE NEWS he’s only taking the good information about himself and the bad information about Biden to make himself better I say we vote manny 2020!

I opened this terrible app and there were some graphic images of a deformed Cheeto this traumatized me and my phone so bad that my poor phone exploded from the horror of this app I am writing the review on a toaster and my left eye is currently blind so I do not recommend this app to ANYONE thank you
attributes.title: Eww

attributes.review: When I opened the app I see a lot of stuff that I shouldn’t have seen this app makes me feel really bad because this is the person who is the leader of the country that is so sad that he is a racist person and can’t treat people equally
attributes.title: No good bad

attributes.review: I downloaded the app today when I tried getting my tickets the app would kick me out. I restarted my phone twice and it still kicked me out constantly and made my screen go black. This app is no good.
attributes.title: App keeps kicking me out.

attributes.review: I got this app to support my clan duke Donald, but when I got it, there was nothing on our meeting time or place! This app is not useful if you want to bring a community together. At least he lets small gatherings still take place🤡
attributes.title: My kids!

attributes.review: I wanted to download this app because i thought I would see news and updates tiktok. Well when I first got the app it kept kicking me and I saw a orange Oompa Loompa on the screen😭. I’m to scared to go on that app now because it said it wanted to make America great again?!?! WHATT
attributes.title: I can’t😭

attributes.review: I found this so difficult to use. Immediately after downloading the app I had trouble opening it and using it. Very user unfriendly. Absolutely trash and dysfunctional. Such a let down. I was expecting better
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This is so bad... literally garbage. I do not recommend this app at all, it’s so ugly and the person who this app is all about is also really hideous. I can’t even look at him without gagging, there’s so much vomit on my floor right now because of this app.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: i wanted to download this in support of the ✨orange man✨ we have in office, but as soon as i opened the app, it kicked me off! and then my phone transformed into a literal living being and BEAT ME UP! i have never been so disappointed in an app in my life 😔
attributes.title: ✨you made my day✨🦋💗 WORSE 🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our wonderful🥴loving 🥵 accepting😩 president, and I was very disappointed when I opened the app and blacked out!!😂😱I woke up with trump 2020 merchandise all over my room 🤯 and started profusely vomiting 🤮. It seems like he brainwashed me with his racist, misogynistic, and homophobic agenda!! Please help!!!!!
attributes.title: 💫 g r o s s 💫
